summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ConcurrencyPad real-time collaborative text editor. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate), frontend loads correctly but has WebSocket connection issues and clipboard permission error.

resolved_issues.fix: Added proper error handling and break conditions in WebSocket loop

ui_bugs.issue: Clipboard API permission denied error blocks UI interactions

integration_issues.symptoms: Editor shows 'Reconnecting...' overlay, metrics not loading

passed_tests: Landing page loads with Create Room and Join Room options
Create Room button navigates to editor page with new room ID
Join Room with room ID input works
Editor page shows collaborative editor with line numbers
All backend APIs (health, metrics, rooms, simulation) working 100%
Backend user simulation endpoints working correctly
UI components render correctly (editor, sidebar, buttons)

success_percentage.frontend: 70% - UI loads but WebSocket integration failing

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix WebSocket connection issue. WebSocket endpoint /api/ws/{room_id} is not connecting properly from frontend, causing 'Disconnected' status and preventing real-time collaboration features. Backend WebSocket errors have been partially fixed but connection still failing. Also need to investigate why metrics dashboard is not visible when WebSocket is disconnected.
